page.title: 15SHOPS IN BRASTED
page.content: There is now only one small shop in Brasted for people to buy groceries. Fifty years ago there were about ten selling food. Nowadays most people have cars so that they can reach the nearby larger towns where the shops are larger and sell a wide range of goods.These shops are usually cheaper and stay open longer. Years ago people seldom left the village for anything. The local shops are now mostly antiques.There are sixteen in Brasted alone.The windows are full of old furniture,china and brass,pictures and maps all brightly polished and attractively displayed.This brings many visitors to Brasted where they have a wide choice in a small place.
